root.name: Mad Father
root.description: OverviewMad Father is a free horror-adventure game created by Sen on Wolf RPG Editor. The story follows Aya Drevis, a sheltered, eleven year-old girl, who is thrown into a horrifying dilemma when her home is suddenly teeming with walking corpses. Aya must roam the cursed mansion in order to discover the secrets behind these corpses and her scientist father.
